title: The Rogue: Best friends BDSM-themed romance novella
description: A divorce attorney, Lisa Swan, is best friends with Aaron Trenton, a part-time Dom at a BDSM club. During one of her divorce cases she's forced to visit The Rogue, a club Aaron is a member of, in order to get evidence for one of her clients. During her visit she discovers she's both into the BDSM lifestyle and her best friend. WIll she admit her feelings for him and risk their friendship?Aaron Trenton has always secretly been into his friend, Lisa. Thinking she is the vanilla type of girl, he keeps his feelings to himself. Although he wants nothing more tham to have Lisa as his girlfriend and a submissive, the Dom knows her feelings for him are purely platonic.When one evening Lisa runs from the Rogue, he is devastated, thinking she's disgusted with his lifestyle.After Lisa avoids him for days, he finally decides to give chase and show her just how good they can be together by making her submit to him.
author: Nora Skye
